verbs.description: [ARG1: The Trump policy] [V: is] [ARG2: a watershed moment in which the global alpha male turns its back on its allies and friends] — the result is unpredictability and uncertainty .

The Trump policy is [ARGM-LOC: a watershed moment] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: the global alpha male] [V: turns] [ARG1: its back] [ARG2: on its allies and friends] — the result is unpredictability and uncertainty .
The Trump policy is a watershed moment in which the global alpha male turns its back on its allies and friends — [ARG1: the result] [V: is] [ARG2: unpredictability and uncertainty] .
